query:
UPDATE generate_templates
                SET
                    background_image_file_id = $1,
                    font_color = $2,
                    writing_mode = $3,
                    margin_block_start = $4,
                    margin_inline_start = $5,
                    line_spacing = $6,
                    letter_spacing = $7,
                    font_size = $8,
                    font_weight = $9,
                    updated_at = $10,
                    disabled = $11,
                    version = $12
                WHERE
                    user_id = $13
                    AND id = $14
                    AND version = $15
